findings.title: Unprotected SELFDESTRUCT Instruction
findings.description: The contract contains an unprotected SELFDESTRUCT instruction which can lead to unintended destruction of the contract.

findings.title: Unprotected Ether Withdrawal
findings.description: The contract allows unprotected ether withdrawal.

findings.title: Unchecked Call Return Value
findings.description: The return value of a call is not checked, which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Floating Pragma
findings.description: The contract uses a floating pragma version which can lead to unexpected behavior and security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Outdated Compiler Version
findings.description: The contract uses an outdated compiler version.

findings.title: Deployer can take BNB from contract
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to withdraw BNB from the contract.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: Deployer can mint after initial deployment, allowing for an unlimited number of tokens to be created.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: Deployer can take BNB from contract
